library(rattle)

```{.r .cell-code}
data(weatherAUS)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_2d8f823848bf82a4a7adedb5908f850c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
weather <- weatherAUS %>% 
  filter(Location %in% c("Hobart", "Uluru", "Wollongong")) %>% 
  mutate(temp9am = Temp9am, temp3pm = Temp3pm, location = Location) 
```
:::



## Exercise 1
### a

::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e33e67514ddf14eec9ee392115e0b7fe'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(weather, aes(y = temp3pm, x = temp9am, color = location)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "Temperature at 9 am (Celsius)", y = "Temperature at 3 pm (Celsius)", title = "The Relation between Temp3pm and Temp9am in Different Cities in Australia", color = "Location")  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 103 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



### b
"The Relation between Temp3pm and Temp9am in Different Cities in Australia"

::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_96c7d25f76190ea2dc0ff046308846d3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(weather, aes(y = temp3pm, x = temp9am, color = location)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "Temperature at 9 am (Celsius)", y = "Temperature at 3 pm (Celsius)", color = "Location")  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 103 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Exercise 2


::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_06866e652beb9d7ce16e9223a91fce43'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(weather, aes(x = temp3pm, fill = location)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(x = "3pm temperature (Celsius)")  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 57 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range
(`stat_density()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### a
It is the distribution of 3pm temperature of 3 cities in Australia.


::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_cc751258eaafffb543c31c4e3da8ab93'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(weather, aes(x = temp3pm, fill = location)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(x = "3pm temperature (Celsius)")  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 57 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range
(`stat_density()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){fig-alt='distribution of 3pm temperature of 3 cities in Australia' width=672}
:::
:::


### b
Hobart and Uluru will be too similar too each other.

### c

::: {.cell hash='activity-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_460d98c43d9dd6b9869f5d4ca80f112a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(weather, aes(x = temp3pm, fill = location)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(x = "3pm temperature (Celsius)") + 
  scale_fill_viridis_d()    
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 57 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range
(`stat_density()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
